name: Match Point Tennis
description:
Virtual Reality Tennis

Strap on your headset and let’s play Tennis! Serve, smash, slice and and spin your way to tennis glory with our unique and fun VR tennis game. Match Point Tennis is a VR tennis game that’s easy and intuitive to play, but challenging and fun to master. 

Beautiful Locations

Jump in and play tennis at some of the world’s most exclusive and iconic tennis courts, whether it’s 1000ft high above a Dubai beach or amongst the wildlife in the African savanna, Match Point Tennis offers some truly epic locations.

Online Play (coming soon)

Feeling social? Invite your friends for a casual rally or challenge them to a ranked match - Match Point Tennis is the perfect way for tennis enthusiasts to connect online. Competing in matches and tournaments will earn you in-game-currency which you can spend on tennis gear and clothing for your character.

Virtual Tennis for Fitness

Get those arms swinging! Match point tennis offers a fun and relaxing way to burn calories while you serve those aces!
